articles.title: Medic has no regrets after helping person with the virus on flight - Insider - INSIDER
articles.description: Medic Tony Aldapa performed CPR on 62-year-old Isaias Hernandez when he had a medical emergency on a flight last week.
articles.content:
A medic who performed CPR on a man who had COVID-19 on a United Airlines flight last week says that he has no regrets.

articles.author: Tuvan Gumrukcu, Ali Kucukgocmen
articles.title: Turkey says China's Sinovac COVID vaccine 91.25% effective in late trials - Reuters
articles.description: A COVID-19 vaccine developed by China's Sinovac Biotech is 91.25% effective, according to interim data from a late-stage trial in Turkey, a potentially much better result than reported from a separate trial of the vaccine in Brazil.
